> On 3/1/2017 at 10:50 PM, NemesisBosseret said:

> Need help.    How do i remove the persistent rotation menu from my screen.      Its kinda annoying i cant get rid of it and ive now got two of them.    I just want the mod to run dont need the on screen pop up
> 

You can click the gear on the top left in the menu, and then under "GUI Visibility Mode" select "Stock Toolbar". After that, you should see a blue button of a square surrounded by two arrows appear on the right of your screen. If you click this, the menu will disappear and reappear when you click it again.

Just noticed something. I have an asteroid that is actually passing through Kerbin's atmosphere at only 16.980km (pretty cool!) but although that's the <abbr title="Periapsis">Pe</abbr> it says it has in the Tracking Station when I load into the flight scene and PR loads the <abbr title="Periapsis">Pe</abbr> drops to 16.277km. When I remove PR, the <abbr title="Periapsis">Pe</abbr> only drops to 16.979. This is consistent if I reload to before I visit the asteroid in both cases. With PR installed the <abbr title="Periapsis">Pe</abbr> always drops to 16.277km whereas with PR uninstalled the <abbr title="Periapsis">Pe</abbr> always drops minimally to just 16.979km. I deleted all the config files except the default one in the Plugin Data folder, but the problem still remained. Is anyone able to drop a vessel into an atmopsheric <abbr title="Periapsis">Pe</abbr> and recreate?
